title: Citi Named Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean in the Euromoney Awards for Excellence 2012
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi gained recognition for its investment banking division in Latin America with the announcement that Euromoney has awarded it Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean for the third consecutive year in the Euromoney Awards for Excellence. The award was presented during a dinner in London, where Citi was also named Best Cash Management House in Latin America for the fourth consecutive year. Citi was also named and Best Global Emerging Markets Investment Bank and Best Bank in Chile (Banco de Chile).
tag-1: Citi Named Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean in the Euromoney Awards for Excellence 2012
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citi gained recognition for its investment banking division in Latin America with the announcement that Euromoney has awarded it Best Investment Bank in the Caribbean for the third consecutive year in the Euromoney Awards for Excellence. The award was presented during a dinner in London, where Citi was also named Best Cash Management House in Latin America for the fourth consecutive year. Citi was also named and Best Global Emerging Markets Investment Bank and Best Bank in Chile (Banco de Chile).
tag-4: Suresh Maharaj, Head for Central America & Caribbean at Citi, said, "The Caribbean is strategically important for Citi Latin America. We are delighted to receive this award for the third consecutive year, which is an important recognition of the expertise of our Investment Banking and the strength of our global network."
tag-5: Combining local presence and expertise in 23 countries in the region, together with global capabilities, Citi provides unsurpassed and consistent products and services to local, regional and global clients in the Latin America region.
tag-6: With over two decades of history, the Euromoney Awards for Excellence are among the most respected awards in the financial services industry.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
